import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import axios from 'axios' function EditModal(props) { const [name, setName] = useState() const onsubmit = async () => { axios.put( `https://api.trello.com/1/cards/${props.cardNewId}?key=d99233bea37b0025a58fa72dc607d4ff&token=e8c437e0e01d12dfdf3abcb5bf7fe9b8f62094009251fc654ff71d1607517edb&name=${name}` ) props.activeEditModal() window.location.reload() } const onHandleChange = (e) => { setName(e.target.value) } return (
×
) } EditModal.propTypes = { activeModal: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, activeEditModal: PropTypes.func.isRequired, cardNewId: PropTypes.string.isRequired } export default EditModal
